document_data.caption: A map showing Vathal in the Golden Water.
document_data.name: Vathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Vathal''', which was also spelled '''Vathel''', was a small island located on the [[Golden Water]] in the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: The island was located in the southern region of the Golden Water, just north of [[Var]] and the small bay called [[the Throat]].
document_data.Activities: There were no permanent settlements on Vathal during the 14{{th}} century DR.
